thread.title: Democrats Obtain More Details on Bank CEO’s Outreach to Army

author: Erica Orden
title: Democrats Obtain More Details on Bank CEO’s Outreach to Army

organizations.name: bank ceo’s outreach to army an

text:
An executive whose bank lent as much as $16 million to former Trump campaign chairman Paul Manafort around the time the banker was seeking to become Army secretary called Army personnel shortly after the election to inquire about the confirmation process, according to information provided by the Pentagon to congressional Democrats.
Stephen Calk, the chief executive of the Federal Savings Bank and a former campaign adviser to President Donald Trump, also spoke to the Army’s chief of staff eight days after the 2016 election...
